title: SECP launches report “Empowering Innovation: Roadmap for Startups”
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP):The Securities and Exchange Commission of Pakistan (SECP) on Thursday launched its report, “Empowering Innovation: Roadmap for Startups”, as a follow-up to the inaugural Pakistan Startup Summit 2024 held in Karachi last year.
The event was attended by a diverse group of stakeholders, including policymakers, entrepreneurs, investors, and thought leaders.
The report builds on the summit’s discussions and incorporates feedback from various stakeholders, outlining key challenges and opportunities in Pakistan’s startup ecosystem.
It also highlights regulatory measures introduced by the SECP to support startup growth. Additionally, the report provides a forward-looking roadmap with actionable recommendations for regulators, government bodies, financial institutions, entrepreneurs, and investors.
SECP Commissioner Zeeshan Rehman Khattak thanked participants for their valuable contributions and reiterated the SECP’s commitment to fostering innovation by bridging the gap between regulators and startups.
He emphasized the importance of collaboration among all stakeholders to drive sustainable growth. Participants also agreed on the need for regular consultations tween startups, investors, and regulators to address emerging challenges and refine policies based on real-time feedback.
The full report is now available for public access on the SECP’s official website.
